ygData.subject: Re: soloing a quick question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Mobs don t wake up from lament pissed off at the bard for one thing. You ll get a lot less banged up and have a lot less downtime if you pull one instead
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, Oct 07/99, TommyC <uber_sorcerer@...> wrote:

> ok forgive me why do ye use lament? I took this out of my lineup when i
> got Lullabye, was that a mistake? Please explain the difference to me
> thank ye :-)

Mobs don't wake up from lament pissed off at the bard for one thing.
You'll get a lot less banged up and have a lot less downtime if you pull
one instead of trying to sleep 3-5.


--
